content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest updates and news to provide a current answer. However, in general, improvements to local infrastructure typically have a positive impact on the desirability of living in an area. This is because it makes the area more accessible, convenient and generally easier to move around in. Good infrastructure may also provide access to essential services such as healthcare, education, and commercial amenities, which are essential for a good quality of life. Improvements to local infrastructure can also enhance the visual appeal of an area, making it more attractive for residents and visitors. Overall, better infrastructure is likely to make Hulme a more desirable place to live, work, and visit.
